Java Class Library API

This is the API documentation for version 1.0.60 of the JSimpleDB Java library.

See: Description

Packages 
Package Description
org.jsimpledb
Abstraction layer allowing access to a Database using normal Java objects.
org.jsimpledb.annotation
Annotations used for automatic creation of a JSimpleDB and corresponding schema configuration of the underlying Database from annotated classes, as well as automatic registration of various listeners, etc.
org.jsimpledb.change
Classes passed to @OnChange-annotated methods.
org.jsimpledb.core
Core classes for the JSimpleDB Java persistence layer.
org.jsimpledb.kv
byte[] array key/value store API and related utility classes.
org.jsimpledb.kv.fdb
KVDatabase implementation based on FoundationDB.
org.jsimpledb.kv.simple
A simple in-memory implementation of the KVDatabase interface.
org.jsimpledb.kv.sql
KVDatabase implementations based on SQL connections.
org.jsimpledb.kv.util
Utility classes relating to the KVDatabase interface.
org.jsimpledb.schema
Classes for modeling JSimpleDB Database schemas.
org.jsimpledb.spring
Spring Framework integration classes.
org.jsimpledb.util
General utility classes used with JSimpleDB.

This is the API documentation for version 1.0.60 of the JSimpleDB Java library.

Visit the JSimpleDB homepage at http://jsimpledb.googlecode.com/.
